name: subsatoshi
tagline: small things can make a big difference
body:
### Introducing subsatoshi.
Subsatoshi aims to be the reference open-source implementation of the [Value Distribution Protocol](https://github.com/ktorn/vdp). In a nutshell, it enables the distribution of value across a large number of related stakeholders, powered by very small off-chain cryptocurrency transactions, known as microtransactions.

### How Small is Small?
Very small. We estimate that for our main [use case](#) we will need a granularity of at least 0.0000000000000001 (that's 16 decimals, which is double of what Bitcoin currently supports).

### What cryptocurrencies are supported?
At first we will focus on Bitcoin, but our goal is to support as many altcoins as possible.

### Authors and Contributors
Filipe (@ktorn), MarcoL (@marcoleong), Gerald (@gestadieu)

Thanks to MarcoS from [Creativen](http://creativen.net/) for the ongoing work on the logo.

Thanks to Serina (@serina-hku) and Gene for joining our team at the [Hackcoin hackathon](https://www.bitcoinhk.org/2015-hackcoin-results/).

### Support or Contact
Open an [issue](https://github.com/macausource/subsatoshi/issues) on our [github repo](https://github.com/macausource/subsatoshi).
